sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Grid,
  Paper,
  Typography,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  CardActions,
  Button,
} from '@mui/material';
import {
  DirectionsCar as CarIcon,
  Build as BuildIcon,
  Warning as WarningIcon,
  Schedule as ScheduleIcon,
} from '@mui/icons-material';

function Dashboard() {
  const stats = [
    {
      title: 'Vehicles',
      value: '2',
      icon: <CarIcon sx={{ fontSize: 40, color: 'primary.main' }} />,
      action: 'View Vehicles',
      path: '/vehicles',
    },
    {
      title: 'Upcoming Maintenance',
      value: '3',
      icon: <BuildIcon sx={{ fontSize: 40, color: 'secondary.main' }} />,
      action: 'View Schedule',
      path: '/maintenance',
    },
    {
      title: 'Active Issues',
      value: '1',
      icon: <WarningIcon sx={{ fontSize: 40, color: 'error.main' }} />,
      action: 'Get Help',
      path: '/chat',
    },
    {
      title: 'Next Service',
      value: 'Oil Change',
      icon: <ScheduleIcon sx={{ fontSize: 40, color: 'success.main' }} />,
      action: 'Schedule',
      path: '/maintenance',
    },
  ];

  return (
    <Box>
      <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
        Dashboard
      </Typography>
      <Grid container spacing={3}>
        {stats.map((stat, index) => (
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={3} key={index}>
            <Card>
              <CardContent>
                <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
                  <Typography variant="h6" component="div">
                    {stat.title}
                  </Typography>
                  {stat.icon}
                </Box>
                <Typography variant="h4" component="div">
                  {stat.value}
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button size="small" href={stat.path}>
                  {stat.action}
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
        ))}
      </Grid>

      <Box sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
        <Paper sx={{ p: 3 }}>
          <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
            Quick Actions
          </Typography>
          <Grid container spacing={2}>
            <Grid item>
              <Button variant="contained" color="primary" href="/chat">
                Ask for Help
              </Button>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item>
              <Button variant="outlined" color="primary" href="/vehicles">
                Add Vehicle
              </Button>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item>
              <Button variant="outlined" color="primary" href="/maintenance">
                Schedule Maintenance
              </Button>
            </Grid>
          </Grid>
        </Paper>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default Dashboard;
